display_long_description:
Get ready to ROCK and DRUM HARD in this unique VR and MR rhythm game!

**NEW:** Social camera (LCK) + 1 bonus song to unlock + tons of drumsticks to unlock + visual improvements

# THIS IS SMASH DRUMS! 
[media]

Embark on an **epic** drumming journey that will have you destroying multiple environments through chaos and flames! Be prepared to smash drums to 58 great rock songs, and more to come!

This is Smash Drums!  
Rock & roll has never been more alive...    

# MIXED REALITY: SMASH YOUR PLACE!
[media]

# SOCIAL CAMERA MODE!
[media]

# KEY FEATURES

● **Unique, intensity-based gameplay:** tap the crystal drums and SMASH the hell out of the burning drums!

● **Smash down multiple environments** in single-player mode, including: a prison, a rock show… and the Moon!

● **Multiplayer arena (2-8 drummers):** rule over the Co-op and Versus modes;

● **Live Ranking:** watch yourself climb up the leaderboards as you play (global or friends);

● Unlock tracks, skins & achievements

# AIXR 2021 “VR Game of the Year” finalist
[media]


Rock Legends song packs: additional purchases required

Mixed Reality mode displays black & white passthrough footage on Meta Quest 2
